Before using MeshCommunicator we require the following permissions in order to communicate with other devices:

MeshCommunicator uses bluetooth to communicate. Bluetooth can potentially be used to derive user location so your permission is needed to allow functionality. Without this permission, MeshCommunicator cannot function.
